?! I did not quite understand this move. The Black Knight leaves the defense of the square h7, and with my next move both Knights are stranded on the back line, making my center pawns even stronger.

Exchanging the pawns on d5 would give White a clear edge due to the "anchor" pawn on d5 and a lot more room for future operations. On the other hand, now the full force of the mobile center begins to show.
